name: Vital (itch)
description:
This is just a small playground to get the general feel of the game.

ESC - Back to main menu

WASD - movement

Space - Jumping

E - Pick up items

Left Mbtn - Use item

F - Drop item

****************** UPDATE *********************

Version 1.0.0.2

Added throwing sounds.

Added different colors for objects that can be manipulated.

Added resolution and graphical settings.

Added progression to next level.

Fixed object scaling bug.

Smaller filesize

It's pretty buggy right now, this is just a simple test.
